details.title: Glossy
content: Glossy is a seasoned full-stack developer with a knack for creating visually stunning interfaces.
She has over 8 years of experience working with enterprise-grade systems.
In her free time, she contributes to open-source and mentors junior developers.

details.title: Jet Nova
content: Jet is a DevOps engineer with deep knowledge in CI/CD pipelines and Kubernetes orchestration.
He's worked at multiple startups, helping scale their infrastructure efficiently.
Outside of work, Jet loves building mechanical keyboards and tinkering with 3D printing.

details.title: Arya Sparks
content: Arya is a front-end wizard specializing in animations and performance optimization.

She also runs a tech blog and speaks at front-end conferences globally.
